msg: A tear dropped into the sea and when it finds you is the day I will stop wishing you were here
Distance is only a test to see if our love is ready for the lifelong journey
You may not be here but you are in my dreams and I just want to stay there with you in your arms forever
My eyes, arms, and heart will always know where you are, from the top of your head to your smallest toe
Every second of every day that you’re away, I know will all be worth it someday
As the clock ticks, I remember that it’s just time passing until I get to spend it with you
We will be forever together and never really apart
Though you’ re far away,you’ re right here in my heart
The smell of you, the expression on your face, the touch of your hand… it’ s all right here in my mind every day
When you left, you took my heart with you but I know you’ ll both be back someday and I’ ll again feel complete
I’ m here,, you’ re there.But my heart and spirit are with you today and every day
Tasks each day seem mundane compared to the existence of my love so far away
I miss the piece of my heart that you took with you
I can’t even put into words how much you mean to me and each day I hope that I will open the door to your face
It is only for you that I will go through the heartache. I can bear the distance but can’ t imagine my life without you
We may be apart but true love is never inseparable
I don’ t just miss you, I MISS YOU!
When you mean so much, the distance means so little
If only I was kissing you instead of missing you…
I don’t like to wait, but if it means that I have to wait for you, I’ll wait forever
I’m jealous of the people who get to see you today
I will give up on our love the day the stars shop shining and the moon falls from the sky
I miss your strong hands touching me so gently
It’s hard to not be with you today but it’d be worse if I was without you forever
This distance hasn’t been easy but it will be worth it
Our love grew over the course of time and I believe it can cover distances too
Really great loves rarely come without struggles. This will be worth every tear and painful moment
You’ re held in my heart until you’ re held in my arms
I’ m presently in love with a man who lives in my future
I’ ve loved someone nearby before and it didn’ t work, I wanted to try something new so it’s a blessing to fall in love with you
Miles and time zones mean nothing when I know that you’re right here in my heart
Even though you’re miles away, your voice is more comforting than the ones I hear here
Distance only separates our bodies. It will never separate our hearts
I’ ve been without you before. It was before I even knew. And now I’ m without you again, and I know that love is true
I may have already met my prince but I’ m waiting patiently, for him to come back and rescue me
I know that our future is just awaiting us to make more beautiful memories
Our love is like a fairytale, I can’t wait for you to kiss me to wake me up from this dream
Every night, before I go to sleep, I actually imagine you by my side
When I miss you and can’t visit you, I visit the memories we have already made and can’t wait to make more
Crying and worrying doesn’t bring you here but I always do hold you in my heart, my dear
Missing you every day is hard but it’s another day closer to seeing you again
Our bodies may be separated but our love keeps us connected
Love is always greater than distance
Even if you look really weird on a web cam, I still miss your weirdness
I keep my phone next to me because I know you’re just a call away
When you’re so far away it’s hard to sleep but I get anxious because you’re always waiting in my dreams
The distance between us has made me realize you are not worth ever letting go
No matter where you are today, you’re in my heart and that makes it sing
Time and distance will never break two hearts that are truly meant for each other
How far can love travel? I guess we will just test it
We are another day closer and we are another day stronger
Quality is better than convenience so our love is greater than distance
This distance is not an obstacle, It’ s just a reminder of how strong our love truly can be
When I can’ t feel your heartbeat, then I know you’ re too far away
You’ re on my mind as I drift to sleep and the first thought when I wake up
If we were never apart, we’ d never know how strong our love could be
I’ ll never give up on you as long as we are underneath the same sky and breathing the same air
It’ s amazing that just a few minutes of hearing from you will make my entire day
Being apart has taught me to appreciate what we have when we are together
My heart has traveled a million miles just to spend time with you even when the rest of me can’ t
Sometimes I don’t know if you miss me or forget me but each day, I tell myself that love will bring us together again
When I look at the moon, it makes me smile because I know you’re out there underneath the same one
I long for the day when I can be beside you and know that this is the time apart spent is over and has been worth it
Loving you this much is almost cruelty but the suffering is worth knowing I’ll be beside you soon
Even though you are worlds away, we dream under the same sky, and you’ll be in my arms someday
Sometimes I cry and others I chuckle, You’ re the one that makes me smile and the distance between us brings the sadness
Your absence has made my heart grow fonder but it sure has made the rest of me lonely
Even though you’ re so far away, I fall in love with you more and more each day
When the wind blows,, listen, for my whisper telling you I love you!
Thinking of time we have spent together are what keeps me going each day because I know we will return and it will be so much better in each and every way
As honest as I am when I say I love you, know with the same truth, I’m coming back to you
Taking each day, a minute at a time, I count the seconds until you’re back in my arms
You are what gives me the desire to breathe each day and every time I think of you, that breath seems to be taken away
You are my reason for being and the only one who I long to see again soon
If love alone could bring us together, I’d be right next to you forever
When the sun shines, it reminds me of the glow of your face when we are together. You will be radiant again soon, my love
Technology may help us stay in contact but love is what really will keep us in touch
I long for you every single day to walk through that door and tell me this time apart is through
You are my beautiful angel and when the rain falls, I know the other angels are crying for us to be together again soon
Everything about you is so delicate and precious and across the miles, I handle your heart with care
When I miss you, I put my hand on my heart and I feel you there
The distance apart is just a little time spent alone in exchange to spend more time with you, the one I love
I knew a good thing when I saw it and I expect to see it again soon
The joy of meeting again is what keeps me dealing with the pain of being apart
We are apart but as long as we’ re under the same sun, moon,and sky, I’ m reminded we are truly together
When I start to miss you, I realize how lucky I am to have someone so amazing to miss.
The time spent apart will only make our next kiss that much sweeter
Though I only have pieces of you here with me, I know it won’t be long until I have all of you beside me
Distance apart brings me sadness, Then I remember there is someone else out there experiencing the same thing. You!
If only I could fly, I would use my wings to be right beside you at the start of every day
If only I could count the amount of air between us, that’ s the same amount of breaths you’ ve taken away
When the night is still,it is the silence that brings me closest to you
The silence of the night brings me to tears and I silently wish you were here
The past is what brought us together ,The present keeps us apart. The future holds you close to me, right next to my heart
I keep telling myself that the time spent apart is minimal when I consider we’ ll be together forever soon
, In my heart there is an emptiness only you can fill.You will fill it again soon
Soon, we will be together but soon isn’t soon enough
I never thought I’d be so lucky in love and then so unlucky away from my love, I hope to get lucky again soon
You might still be away from me but you’ re still the smile on my face
It’ s sometimes hard to find traces of you but then I feel my heart beat and am reminded it beats for you
You have my spirit, my heart, and my soul, I’ ll be back soon to get it and pick you up along the way
I am lonely but never alone because you are always in my heart, my soul, and my dreams
When our love has defied the distance, I know that our true love will survive
Whether we are far away or right next to each other, it doesn’t change the amount of love I have for you
My LOVE for you knows no distance. It travels all the way to you every single day
Our distance apart can be measured, but my love, for you cannot
, At the end of every path I take each day,, it still leads me back to you waiting in my dreams
I’ ve spent enough time alone that this separation makes me want to never leave your side again
Our physical bodies are far apart but you’ re always right here in my heart
You’ re never really that far away. The miles and distance just makes it seem that way
If love builds bridges, I should be able to walk right up to you
Simply lacking you is more meaningful to me than the presence of others
The more you are absent from my life, the more I miss you and the more I love you
The distance may be far, but I believe that my heart can cover it all
